means: 未被减轻的，未受救济的，无变化的

sentence.Network_en: The sun baked down on the concrete, unrelieved by any breeze.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳炙烤着水泥，热度没有因为任何微风而有所减轻。

sentence.Network_en: Ah, how unrelieved boring life would be!
sentence.Network_cn: 啊, 那将是一点也没有减轻的无聊的生活!

sentence.Network_en: The weather seemed almost balmy after the unrelieved subzero temperatures of the plateau.
sentence.Network_cn: 在经历了高原上持续零下的气温之后这里的天气看起来可以说是相当温暖了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Anxiety would be extinct.Time would stretch on and on, withambition long departed from the human heart.Ah, how unrelieved(未减轻的) boring life would.
ah , how unrelieved boring life would be ., 啊 , 长此以往人生将变得多么乏味无聊.
unreliable 靠不住的, unrelieved 无变化的, unrelieved 单调的
unrelieved 单调的, unrelieved 未受救济的, unrelieved 无变化的

list.abs: 2013年7月14日 - 关的残余应力(unrelieved stress) 以导致暴露于应力和高温( 这与基材( 特别是半导体晶片) 的抛光有关) 时产生窗体的几何尺寸收缩。包括亚稳态聚氨酯.
unreliable 不可靠的unrelieved stress 残馀应力unremittance 非衰减性

entry.def: If you describe something unpleasant as unrelieved, you mean that it is very severe and is not replaced by anything better, even for a short time.

example.ex: The sun baked down on the concrete, unrelieved by any breeze.
example.tran: 太阳炙烤着水泥，热度没有因为任何微风而有所减轻。

auth_sentence.content: We all wear unrelieved black like a funeral procession.
auth_sentence.res_content: We all wear unrelieved black like a funeral procession.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We all wear unrelieved black like a funeral procession.

auth_sentence.content: Undiluted, unrelieved boss-ness awaits at the top.
auth_sentence.res_content: Undiluted, unrelieved boss-ness awaits at the top.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Undiluted, unrelieved boss-ness awaits at the top.

auth_sentence.content: She died in unrelieved pain at the age of forty-one.
auth_sentence.res_content: She died in unrelieved pain at the age of forty-one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She died in unrelieved pain at the age of forty-one.
